product_name: LancomeRose Sugar Scrub & Tonique Confort 3 Piece Limited Edition Hydrating Gift Set
summary: SummaryLancôme Rose Sugar Scrub & Tonique Confort Hydrating Gift Set featuring our comforting creamy foaming face cleanser, rich in rosehip oil, shea butter and Rose de France.
details: DetailsIncludesRose Sugar Scrub (3.4 oz)Mini Tonique Confort (1.7 oz)Mini Hydra Zen Gel Cream (0.5 oz)BenefitsWash away impurities for a healthy, clean complexion with Rose Sugar Scrub.Hydrate and refresh skin with Tonique Confort toner and Hydra Zen Gel Cream face moisturizer.Item 2645209How To UseStep 1. Massage Rose Sugar Scrub over wet face and throat. Rinse with lukewarm water.Step 2. Apply Tonique Confort with a cotton pad or with hands -- this method is ideal when used as a cleansing toner and makeup remover, as excess impurities and leftover makeup residues are wiped away with the cotton pad. Saturate a cotton pad and gently sweep toner with hyaluronic acid cross the face, neck and décolleté twice a day (morning and evening). No rinse needed.Step 3. Finish with Hydra Zen Gel Cream.Shipping & Coupon RestrictionsThis brand is excluded from most Ulta Beauty coupons.See brand eligibility details

Apply Tonique Confort with a cotton pad or with hands -- this method is ideal when used as a cleansing toner and makeup remover, as excess impurities and leftover makeup residues are wiped away with the cotton pad. Saturate a cotton pad and gently sweep toner with hyaluronic acid cross the face, neck and décolleté twice a day (morning and evening). No rinse needed.Step 3. Finish with Hydra Zen Gel Cream.
